A couple of issues were encountered with this entry field in the JPA Details view.

1. When entering the name of a table generator the cursor can jump to the beginning of the field while backspacing and text entry.

2. When typing in the field the Java source flickers and the focus jumps between the field and the Java in an infinite loop.  I broke this by changing focus.

Noticed below exception trying to reproduce this.  Wasn't able to reproduce, but the exception may be related.  Also noticed that Generator Name combo wasn't being cleard from one entity to the next.
